actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill making supplemental appropriations to carry out the lead-based paint poisoning prevention program for fiscal year ending June 30, 1974.

summary.text: Provides supplemental appropriations, for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974, of $17,490,000 for detection, treatment and elimination of lead-based paint poisoning under the Lead-Based Paint Poisoning Prevention Act and $5,010,000 for the demonstration and research program under such Act.

titles.title: A bill making supplemental appropriations to carry out the lead-based paint poisoning prevention program for fiscal year ending June 30, 1974.
